newsitem.title: JAPAN: INSIGHT - JGBs seen falling toward 123.
newsitem.headline: INSIGHT - JGBs seen falling toward 123.

text.p: FUTURE RANGE/DAY SPPRT RSTNC RSI-9 MA-5 MA-25
OUTLOOK OF BOJ OPERATION AT 0020 GMT: drainage of 200 bln yen -------------VIEWS FROM THE MARKET - May 9--------------------
*Key June 10-year Japanese government bond (JGB) futures likely to fall toward 123 on Friday amid ongoing downtrend, after poor results in Thursday's six-year JGB auction.
*June may find floor at this year's low of 123.60 and then at 123.39, previous low hit on November 12, but further fall of dollar against yen may fuel fears of higher Japanese rates.
"The June may fall by one yen from the current level within a couple of days," the dealer said.
